Package org.dataconservancy.packaging.tool.impl.support

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    C14NValidator
    Validators implementing this interface support canonicalization of valid values.
    IpmTreeFactory.NodeTypeSetter
    Clients wishing to assign node types while building a tree should implement this interface.
    Validator
    An interface for validators
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EmailValidator
    This is a simple EmailValidator based on commonly used regex.
    FilenameValidator
    This validator checks for validity of file path components as defined by the Data Conservancy BagIt Provile Version 1.0 To check a path for validity, a caller should apply this to each component in the path.
    FilenameValidatorService
    This service is responsible for checking all filenames in a filesystem tree which is being considered for processing into a package, and flagging all filenames which violate naming conventions which have been implemented in the interest of cross-platform compatibility.
    IpmTreeFactory  
    PhoneNumberValidator
    This is a phone number validating utility using google's libphonenumber.
    URIValidator  
    UrlValidator
    Class which provide convenient method to validate a string for an RDF URI
    ValidatorFactory
    A simple factory class which, when provided a validator type, provides an appropriate validator for property values
